author: Ann Skelton
title: Sunstorm Digital Art by Dorothy Pugh - Pixels
text: Sunstorm is a piece of digital artwork by Dorothy Pugh which was uploaded on April 14th, 2015. More from Dorothy Pugh Comments (20) Ann Skelton 8 Hours Ago Splendid abstract Dorothy! l/f Thank you, Ann! Constance Lowery gorgeous abstract. L/F Thank you, Constance! Kim Tran Delightful work and lovely vibrant colours Dorothy! l/f/pin Thank you, Kim! Rjf at beautifullart RJ Friedenthal Nice Work!!! RjFxx Anne Gifford This encapsulates a springy, light filled mood filled with motion, Dorothy. Like! Thank you, Anne! Rjf at beautifullart RJ Friedenthal Very nice work!!! love RjFxx Adding my like now Marina Kojukhova This is SO beautiful art Dorothy!!! L/F Thank you, Marina! Kiki Art Absolutely delightful. Thank you, Kiki Art! Chrisann Ellis Dorothy, Your Work has been Featured On The Home Page of Weekly Fun For All Mediums!..Colorful Work!!...Congrats!! Thank you for the feature, Chrisann! Chrisann Ellis Dorothy, Beautiful and Creative and So Expressive!!..vt Thank you so much, Chrisann! Sora Neva Brava Dorothy! Your artwork is featured in Mutamea - My Change. Many thanks, Sora, for your recognition! Ronel Broderick Congratulations ! Your Outstanding Art Work was FEATURED in the Group and rated The Best of the Best Thank you so much, Ronel, for this honor! Robyn King Gorgeous work Dorothy!! Thank you, Robyn! Cheryl Cutler Love the colors Thank you, Cheryl! Lyric Lucas Congratulations your creative and unique art work is featured in the "Out Of The Ordinary" group! Thank you, Lyric! John Bailey Congratulations on being featured in the Fine Art America Group "Images That Excite You!" Thank you, John! Rjf at beautifullart RJ Friedenthal Wonderful Painting! I love this most charming interesting Painting!!! RjFxx. Gabriella Weninger - David Beautiful work and colors Dorothy! Thank you, Gabriella!
